roleset.name: to spread or diffuse

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: But `` an eerie silence pervaded '' the junk market Friday as prices tumbled on hundreds of high - yield bonds despite `` no active trading , '' says John Lonski , an economist at Moody 's Investors Service Inc .

propbank.arg: as prices tumbled on hundreds of high - yield bonds despite `` no active trading
